page_content:
Mds Technologies Ltd

Assured Cloud Storage

Cloud Storage from Skyscape is a secure, massively scalable and very resilient next generation storage platform designed to address a wide variety of use-cases.

Features

  • Supports various developer languages, RESTful and Amazon S3 API
  • Cloud object storage natively enables application deduplication & redundancy
  • Integrates with existing, native and virtualized, enterprise applications
  • Connect via DDoS-protected Internet, PSN (GCF, Assured & Protected), N3
  • HybridConnect: Your own dedicated circuits (CPA encrypted tunnels
  • Secure: OFFICIAL & OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE, Pan Government Accredited (IL2 & IL3)
  • UK Sovereign data centres, with UK SC cleared staff
  • Green; UK facilities which offer market leading efficiency
  • Pay for what you use, scale indefinitely and on-demand

Benefits

  • 30 day free trial option
  • Multiple use cases: Backup, Archiving, replacement for shared storage
  • Reduce local storage requirements and overheads
  • Appropriate for public sector – local government, health/blue light services
  • Reduce local compliance overhead with pre-accredited solutions
  • Know where your data is at all times
  • Easy to adopt: test, develop and run proof of concepts
  • Flexible payment options reduce CAPEX spend

Pricing

£0.09 per gigabyte per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
